mapper.insert: insert into device_info (name, category, company, price, spec, photo_name, photo_path) values (#{name}, #{category}, #{company}, #{price}, #{spec}, #{photo_name}, #{photo_path})
mapper.update: update device_info set name = #{name}, category = #{category}, company = #{company}, price = #{price}, spec = #{spec}, photo_name = #{photo_name}, photo_path = #{photo_path} where id = #{id}
update device_info set rating_avg = (select avg(rating) from review where dev_id = #{id}) where id = #{id}
